articles.title: China censored social media posts about Chloé Zhao’s Oscar win - The Verge
articles.description: The news of Chloé Zhao’s Oscar win for Best Director has been censored on social media and search engines. Zhao said in a 2013 interview that China was a place “where there are lives everywhere,” which may have prompted the censorship.
articles.content:
One op-ed by a Chinese site said Zhao should be more mature
